verses.verse: <S%H120>Man<s%> that is <S%H3205>born<s%> of a <S%H802>woman<s%> is of <S%H7116>few<s%> days <S%H3117><s%>and <S%H7646>full<s%> of <S%H7267>trouble.<s%>
He <S%H3318>comes<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> like a <S%H6731>flower,<s%> and is <S%H5243>cut<s%> down: he <S%H1272>flees<s%> also as a <S%H6738>shadow,<s%> and <S%H5975>continues<s%> not.
And does you <S%H6491>open<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> on <S%H2088>such<s%> an one, and <S%H935>bring<s%> me into <S%H4941>judgment<s%> with you?
<S%H4310>Who<s%> can <S%H5414>bring<s%> a <S%H2889>clean<s%> thing out of an <S%H2931>unclean?<s%> not <S%H259>one.<s%>

<S%H518>Seeing<s%> his <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H2782>determined,<s%> the <S%H4557>number<s%> of his <S%H2320>months<s%> are with you, you have <S%H6213>appointed<s%> his <S%H2706>bounds<s%> that he <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H5674>pass;<s%>
<S%H8159>Turn<s%> from him, that he may <S%H2308>rest,<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> he shall <S%H7521>accomplish,<s%> as an <S%H7916>hireling,<s%> his <S%H3117>day.<s%>

For there is <S%H8615>hope<s%> of a <S%H6086>tree,<s%> if it be <S%H3772>cut<s%> down, that it will <S%H2498>sprout<s%> <S%H5750>again,<s%> and that the <S%H3127>tender<s%> branch thereof will not <S%H2308>cease.<s%>
<S%H518>Though<s%> the <S%H8328>root<s%> thereof wax <S%H2204>old<s%> in the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and the <S%H1503>stock<s%> thereof <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H6083>ground;<s%>
Yet through the <S%H7381>scent<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> it will <S%H6524>bud,<s%> and <S%H6213>bring<s%> <S%H6213>forth<s%> <S%H7105>boughs<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> a <S%H5194>plant.<s%>
But <S%H1397>man<s%> <S%H4191>dies,<s%> and <S%H2522>wastes<s%> away: yes, <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H1478>gives<s%> up the <S%H1478>ghost,<s%> and <S%H346>where<s%> is he?
As the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H235>fail<s%> from the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and the <S%H5104>flood<s%> <S%H2717>decays<s%> and <S%H3001>dries<s%> up:

So <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7901>lies<s%> <S%H7901>down,<s%> and <S%H6965>rises<s%> not: <S%H5704>till<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> be <S%H1115>no<s%> more, they shall not <S%H6974>awake,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> be <S%H5782>raised<s%> out of their <S%H8142>sleep.<s%>

O that you would <S%H6845>hide<s%> me in the <S%H7585>grave,<s%> that you would keep me <S%H5641>secret,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> your <S%H639>wrath<s%> be <S%H7725>past,<s%> that you would <S%H7896>appoint<s%> me a <S%H2706>set<s%> time, and <S%H2142>remember<s%> me!

<S%H518>If<s%> a <S%H1397>man<s%> <S%H4191>die,<s%> shall he <S%H2421>live<s%> again? <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of my <S%H6635>appointed<s%> <S%H6635>time<s%> will I <S%H3176>wait,<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> my <S%H2487>change<s%> <S%H935>come.<s%>
You shall <S%H7121>call,<s%> and I will <S%H6030>answer<s%> you: you will have a <S%H3700>desire<s%> to the <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands.<s%>
For <S%H6258>now<s%> you <S%H5608>number<s%> my <S%H6806>steps:<s%> do you not <S%H8104>watch<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> my <S%H2403>sin?<s%>
My <S%H6588>transgression<s%> is <S%H2856>sealed<s%> up in a <S%H6872>bag,<s%> and you <S%H2950>sew<s%> up my <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>
And <S%H199>surely<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H5307>falling<s%> <S%H5034>comes<s%> to <S%H5034>nothing,<s%> and the <S%H6697>rock<s%> is <S%H6275>removed<s%> out of his <S%H4725>place.<s%>

The <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H7833>wear<s%> the <S%H68>stones:<s%> you <S%H7857>wash<s%> away the things which <S%H5599>grow<s%> out of the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> and you <S%H6>destroy<s%> the <S%H8615>hope<s%> of <S%H582>man.<s%>
You <S%H8630>prevail<s%> for <S%H5331>ever<s%> against him, and he <S%H1980>passes:<s%> you <S%H8138>change<s%> his <S%H6440>countenance,<s%> and <S%H7971>send<s%> him away.
His <S%H1121>sons<s%> come to <S%H3513>honor,<s%> and he <S%H3045>knows<s%> it not; and they are <S%H6819>brought<s%> <S%H6819>low,<s%> but he <S%H995>perceives<s%> it not of them.
But his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> on him shall have <S%H3510>pain,<s%> and his <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H5921>within<s%> him shall <S%H56>mourn.<s%>
